title: Cholent
description: A classic Jewish dish, traditionally cooked overnight on a Friday and eaten for lunch on the Sabbath.
ingredients: 2 tbsp goose fat or sunflower oil
1.5kg/3lb 5oz beef brisket, or braising steak, cut into cubes
1.8kg/4lb potatoes, preferably King Edward or Maris Piper, peeled and left whole
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large onion, cut into small cubes
